message.content:
To find the decrease in amounts owed to the entity for goods or services sold or provided on credit during the period, we look at the line item related to accounts receivable in the cash flow statement.

The relevant line is:
| (Increase) Decrease in Accounts Receivable | -3098023.69 | 2024-02-01 |

This amount represents the change in accounts receivable, i.e. amounts owed to the entity by customers. Since it is negative, it indicates an increase in amounts owed (accounts receivable increased), so the decrease in amounts owed is negative, meaning amounts owed actually increased.

But the task is to extract the value of decrease in amounts owed, so the relevant value to report is the value given for "(Increase) Decrease in Accounts Receivable," which is `-3098023.69`.

Therefore, the answer is:
```json
{"solution": {"value": "-3098023.69"} }
```
